Q_DESC: Write a program to implement Best fit algorithm.The Best Fit Memory Allocation Algorithm allocates the smallest free partition available in the memory that is sufficient enough to hold the process within the system.It searches the complete memory for available free partitions and allocates the process to the memory partition which is the smallest enough to hold the process.
TESTCASE_1:
5 8
20 10 15 25 15
11 20 22 10 5 21 27 15
###---###SEPERATOR---###---

0 11 4 15 4
